Canada says China has role to play in keeping Red Sea safeCanada's Foreign Minister Melanie Joly on Sunday said China should play a role in keeping the Red Sea safe for commerce because Chinese ships are at risk there as well, and urged Beijing to stop helping Russia sidestep international sanctions. Sun, 18 Feb 2024 16:47:22 GMT 7U4ZKHXPZJPI7EHP22IHRI3PFI https://www.reuters.com/world/canada-says-china-has-role-play-keeping-red-sea-safe-2024-02-18/Steve Scherer世界
China's WuXi AppTec says it poses no national security risks to USChinese biotech firm WuXi AppTec said on Sunday that it posed no national security risks to the United States, following calls by U.S. lawmakers for sanctions on the Shanghai-listed company. Sun, 18 Feb 2024 12:57:05 GMT AKCNG6QOGBPGDFXZGX3XICJQ6E https://www.reuters.com/technology/chinas-wuxi-apptec-says-it-poses-no-national-security-risks-us-2024-02-18/Reuters技术
China's travel spending during Lunar New Year holidays beats pre-COVID levelsTourism revenues in China during the Lunar New Year holidays that ended on Saturday surged by 47.3% year-on-year and surpassed 2019 levels, thanks to a domestic travel boom amid a longer-than-usual break, official data showed on Sunday. Sun, 18 Feb 2024 07:55:28 GMT LV2QV4TFJJKDXCN4R6LLDHHPEQ https://www.reuters.com/markets/asia/chinas-travel-spending-during-lunar-new-year-holidays-beats-pre-covid-levels-2024-02-18/Reuters市场亚洲市场
China's first homegrown airliner makes international debut in SingaporeChina's challenger to Airbus and Boeing's passenger jets, the narrow-body C919 manufactured by the Commercial Aircraft Corporation of China (COMAC), has made its first trip outside Chinese territory, staging a fly-by at the Singapore Airshow on Sunday. Sun, 18 Feb 2024 04:49:03 GMT HQY5ITIORNMRXPJYEPWAFH75CY https://www.reuters.com/business/aerospace-defense/chinas-first-homegrown-airliner-makes-international-debut-singapore-2024-02-18/Lisa Barrington商业航空航天与国防
